Description: Specialty Coffee Paper Filters for Specialty Coffee! This is not just paper, it is specialty paper filters for a cup of specialty coffee: Filter paper made of REFINED PULP (White version): The more commonly seen brewer filters are refined to remove the brown color. It keeps the original flavor of the coffee grounds and makes a very robust pourover drip coffee. NO USED PULP, DYES OR CHEMICALS ARE EVER USED IN THESE PAPER FILTERS. Completely biodegradable. FSC Certified: The FSC certificate shows that the banana-tree fiber to make the paper is only sourced from well-managed, eco-friendly forests. 100% sustainable: No wood is used in the paper making process: ABACA: Manilla Hemp, is extracted from the leaf-stems of a certain species of banana tree, leaving the wood and tree completely intact. Paper making process: Dewatering: Dewater pulp and make a paper sheet. Drying: Dry the paper sheet by heating. Rolling: Roll the paper sheet under finely tuned and adjusted rolling pressure. No bleach, glues, chemicals or unnatural elements are added to the pulp. This is simply a 100% clean, eco-friendly, forest-sustainable paper filter. Period. You will not be disappointed by the strength and suppleness of these highly crafted filters. They will certainly stand out above the rest and make you the perfect cup of joe in the morning - every single time! If you love coffee and if making coffee is a labor of love, these filters - will enhance the quality of your morning coffee making routine! They are elegant, supple and strong. They make the cleanest, consistent coffee. They are made of superior eco-friendly certified materials. Clean-up is a cinch... When done, simply discard filter with used grounds inside.
Ai_description: Specialty coffee filters made of refined pulp for a robust pour-over drip coffee. Eco-friendly and biodegradable. FSC certified and 100% sustainable. Enhance your morning coffee routine with these elegant, supple, and strong filters."
Product_title: CAFEC Abaca Cone-Shaped Coffee Paper Filter

Description: 100% BOROSILICATE GLASS BODY, LED ILLUMINATOR- If it's borosilicate, it must be Borosil! Made of the best quality, pure borosilicate glass this multipurpose electric kettle looks great and performs beautifully. The scratch-resistant borosilicatae glass does not retain stains or odours so you can safely use the kettle to not just boil water but also prepare green tea, coffee, hygienically. The glass, being borosilicate, does not react with any food either. As it is transparent, you can also keep an eye on the contents inside while your kettle is plugged in. The equally attractive LED illumination acts as an indicator. FASTER BOILING - Equipped with 1500 Watt of power this multipurpose electric glass kettle has concealed heating elements that boil large quantity of water, quicker. It's far more energy efficient than boiling water on a gas-stove. The kettle can boil up to 1.8 L of water in 7 to 8 minutes. TOP-NOTCH SAFETY FEATURES - The electric kettle has dry-boil protection which means it won't switch on if there is no water inside. It also has an auto cut-off so the appliance will switch off on its own once the water has finished boiling. The stay-cool handles will not heat up while the water is boiling. EASY TO USE - The 360¬∞ rotating, detachable power base makes it easy to handle the kettle. The spout has a mesh filter that's quite helpful for preparing green tea and similar brews. The kettle also has min-max marking so you can fill it up with the desired quantity of water. EASY TO CLEAN - The bosrosilicate glass body does not collect scales with repeated use so it's relatively easy to clean. It is also detachable from the power base.
Ai_description: High-quality borosilicate glass kettle with LED illuminator. Boils water quickly and safely with 1500W power. Easy to use and clean."
Product_title: Borosil Electric Glass Kettle

Description: 100% BOROSILICATE GLASS BODY, LED ILLUMINATOR- If it's borosilicate, it must be Borosil! Made of the best quality, pure borosilicate glass this multipurpose electric kettle looks great and performs beautifully. The scratch-resistant borosilicatae glass does not retain stains or odours so you can safely use the kettle to not just boil water but also prepare green tea, coffee, hygienically. The glass, being borosilicate, does not react with any food either. As it is transparent, you can also keep an eye on the contents inside while your kettle is plugged in. The equally attractive LED illumination acts as an indicator. FASTER BOILING - Equipped with 1500 Watt of power this multipurpose electric glass kettle has concealed heating elements that boil large quantity of water, quicker. It's far more energy efficient than boiling water on a gas-stove. The kettle can boil up to 1.8 L of water in 7 to 8 minutes. TOP-NOTCH SAFETY FEATURES - The electric kettle has dry-boil protection which means it won't switch on if there is no water inside. It also has an auto cut-off so the appliance will switch off on its own once the water has finished boiling. The stay-cool handles will not heat up while the water is boiling. EASY TO USE - The 360¬∞ rotating, detachable power base makes it easy to handle the kettle. The spout has a mesh filter that's quite helpful for preparing green tea and similar brews. The kettle also has min-max marking so you can fill it up with the desired quantity of water. EASY TO CLEAN - The bosrosilicate glass body does not collect scales with repeated use so it's relatively easy to clean. It is also detachable from the power base.

Description: RAPID BOIL TECHNOLOGY - XECH Hydroboil is a portable electric water bottle that has a powerful heating element with a 300W motor that can literally boil water in under 5 minutes. CONVENIENTLY CONCEALED POWER CORD - Located at the base of the Hydroboil flask is a smartly designed storage with a lid that can safely hold the power cable. The cable itself is ISI Marked for quality standards. SUPERIOR BUILD QUALITY - Hydroboil uses only premium materials. Built using high-density ABS material and 304-grade stainless steel, this electric water bottle is BPA Free and non-toxic making it ideal for everyday use. ADDED SAFETY FEATURES - XECH Hydroboil comes with boil dry protection which means that it will automatically shut down in case you accidentally keep it on and forget. It also has a silicone pressure release cap that will let off steam once the water starts boiling. CONVENIENT ONE BUTTON OPERATION - XECH Hydroboil comes with a convenient one-button operation that makes it super easy to use. The button comes with an LED indicator light to show that it is in operation. ONE HYDROBOIL MULTIPLE APPLICATION - You can now boil water right at your desk without using public electric kettles. Boiling is considered to be the most efficient way to decontaminate water. You can even use Hydroboil to boil water for tea, Green tea, Coffee, Instant noodles, or just hot water. 1 YEAR WARRANTY - The product comes with a 1-year manufacturer's warranty. The customer has to register the warranty on the brand‚Äôs website. To claim a warranty the customer can write to the brand‚Äôs customer support via email or WhatsApp.
Ai_description: Boil water in under 5 minutes with XECH Hydroboil. Conveniently store the power cord and enjoy added safety features. Ideal for everyday use. 1-year warranty."

Description: Century-old coffee drinking style - A long-lasting relationship with filter coffee, the dabara set dates back to the mid 19th century. Ever since then, it‚Äôs been the traditional way of enjoying the South Indian Filter Coffee or Filter Kaapi as it is lovingly called in the South of India. Even to this day, in most South Indian restaurants and homes, the dabara set is the favourite medium to serve hot coffee. Perfectly finished - Sidapur endeavours to bring back the age-old coffee drinking experience to life with the traditional brass dabara set. Brushed matt, with a luxurious and elegant finish, you can take pride in presenting your Filter Kaapi in these to your house guests. As brass oxidises over time and forms patches (which is natural), we recommend that you periodically polish the Dabaras with a brass or appropriate metal polish to maintain its beauty. Premium coffee experience - Dabara sets are still used in most households in the South Indian region. They are a cultural symbol of enjoying traditional Filter Kaapi. Just as a wine glass enhances the flavour and aroma of a fine wine, enjoy your South Indian Filter Coffee in a traditional Dabara for that authentic and best experience. Proudly made in India - Bringing to the forefront that all our coffees are produced and packed completely in India, these matt finished brass dabara sets are also a part of our traditional culture that we proudly make in India. The healthy way - This traditional dabara set is completely made from lead free, heavy duty sterling brass. Each set is of top-quality weighing 200g per set.
Ai_description: Experience the century-old tradition of South Indian Filter Coffee with our brass dabara set. Made in India, this lead-free set is perfect for serving authentic Filter Kaapi. Enjoy the premium coffee experience!"
Product_title: Sidapur Brass Dabara Set - Plain Brushed Matte Finish - For South Indian Filter Coffee - 120ml
